trans-unit.source: Azure Automation data retention
trans-unit.target: Azure Automation data retention

trans-unit.source: Describes the data retention policy for Azure Automation.
trans-unit.target: Describes the data retention policy for Azure Automation.

trans-unit.source: Azure Automation data retention
trans-unit.target: Azure Automation data retention

trans-unit.source: When you delete a resource in Azure Automation, it is retained for 90 days for auditing purposes before being removed permanently.
trans-unit.target: When you delete a resource in Azure Automation, it is retained for 90 days for auditing purposes before being removed permanently.

trans-unit.source: You can’t see or use the resource during this time.
trans-unit.target: You can’t see or use the resource during this time.

trans-unit.source: This policy also applies to resources that belong to an automation account that is deleted.
trans-unit.target: This policy also applies to resources that belong to an automation account that is deleted.

trans-unit.source: Azure Automation automatically deletes and permanently removes jobs older than 90 days.
trans-unit.target: Azure Automation automatically deletes and permanently removes jobs older than 90 days.

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes the retention policy for different resources.
trans-unit.target: The following table summarizes the retention policy for different resources.

trans-unit.source: Data
trans-unit.target: Data

trans-unit.source: Policy
trans-unit.target: Policy

trans-unit.source: Accounts
trans-unit.target: Accounts

trans-unit.source: Permanently removed 90 days after the account is deleted by a user.
trans-unit.target: Permanently removed 90 days after the account is deleted by a user.

trans-unit.source: Assets
trans-unit.target: Assets

trans-unit.source: Permanently removed 90 days after the asset is deleted by a user, or 90 days after the account that holds the asset is deleted by a user.
trans-unit.target: Permanently removed 90 days after the asset is deleted by a user, or 90 days after the account that holds the asset is deleted by a user.

trans-unit.source: Modules
trans-unit.target: Modules

trans-unit.source: Permanently removed 90 days after the module is deleted by a user, or 90 days after the account that holds the module is deleted by a user.
trans-unit.target: Permanently removed 90 days after the module is deleted by a user, or 90 days after the account that holds the module is deleted by a user.

trans-unit.source: Runbooks
trans-unit.target: Runbooks

trans-unit.source: Permanently removed 90 days after the resource is deleted by a user, or 90 days after the account that holds the resource is deleted by a user.
trans-unit.target: Permanently removed 90 days after the resource is deleted by a user, or 90 days after the account that holds the resource is deleted by a user.

trans-unit.source: Jobs
trans-unit.target: Jobs

trans-unit.source: Deleted and permanently removed 90 days after last being modified.
trans-unit.target: Deleted and permanently removed 90 days after last being modified.

trans-unit.source: This could be after the job completes, is stopped, or is suspended.
trans-unit.target: This could be after the job completes, is stopped, or is suspended.

trans-unit.source: The retention policy applies to all users and currently cannot be customized.
trans-unit.target: The retention policy applies to all users and currently cannot be customized.

trans-unit.target: Related articles
